instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up and then find and tap Settings . Tap More , and then tap the NFC On/Off switch to turn it on and off.

While viewing the content that you want to share, hold HTC U11 and the other phone back to back. Illustration showing the location of the NFC transmitter. Make sure that the NFC area (shaded part) of HTC U11 and the other phone's NFC area are close to one another. Experiment by slightly moving the phones until a connection is made. When HTC U11 vibrates, tap the screen to send the content to the other device.
